entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. 30 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. POP 70%
